issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Add benchmarks for SQL query execution
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4604](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4604). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Add benchmarks for various types of SQL query so we can catch performance regressions easily.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4604?focusedCommentId=16790801) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
This work was done under another issue
